Name: Midnight Stories 5
About the game: Midnight Stories This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of Cindy and the rest is full of side stories with various people and hot scenes. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. The game is in 4K ultra HD resolution and fully voiced. For the side stories a huge numbers of voice actors will be delivering crystal audio for your pleasure. The MS5 has the following episodes: Episode 01 - A Surprising Truth (Cindy) (includes paths) Episode 02 - Michelle and Paula Episode 03 - Afterparty (Katie and Victoria) (includes paths) Episode 04 - The Betrayal (Cindy) The game has renders with sound effects and characters are fully voiced. No animation is planned for this release.
